name: Family Chess
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

Chess is a popular table game in Europe.
Family Chess is playable by 1 to 2 players, and is a chess video game that guarantees satisfaction to any type of chess players, no matter you are a beginner or an expert. Try it out today!

This content is compatible with PlayStation®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).
